// Light shader (?) causing massive haloing at start of game

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float3 EyePosVS;
//   float4 clipPlanes;
//   float4x4 matEye;
//   float4x4 matM2WS;
//   float4x4 matMVP;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   matMVP       c8       4
//   matEye       c12      3
//   matM2WS      c20      4
//   clipPlanes   c24      1
//   EyePosVS     c31      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 1, -1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord1 o2
    dcl_texcoord2 o3.xyz

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mov r0.x, c12.z
    mov r0.y, c13.z
    mov r0.z, c14.z
    nrm r1.xyz, r0
    mul r0.xyz, c21, v0.y
    mad r0.xyz, c20, v0.x, r0
    mad r0.xyz, c22, v0.z, r0
    add r0.xyz, r0, c23
    add r0.xyz, r0, -c31
    dp3 o1.w, r1, r0
    mul o1.xyz, r0, c24.y
    mul r0, c9, v0.y
    mad r0, c8, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c10, v0.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c11
    mov o0, r0
    mul r3, r0, c0.xyxx
    mov o3.xyz, c31

// approximately 20 instruction slots used

// Output adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --adjust=texcoord1 VertexShader_64_CRC32_9038076A.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s0
add r2.w, r3.w, -r2.y
mad r3.x, r2.w, r2.x, r3.x
mov o2, r3
